description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nForbearance:
When your creatures are resurrected, they are resurrected with 100% additional {STAT_health}. If this amount exceeds their Maximum {STAT_health}, their Maximum {STAT_health} increases by an amount equal to the difference. This trait does not stack.
name: Shadow Fossil
